rules.description: Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut) (except Idea)
Home => Cmd+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line) (except Idea)
Shift+Home => Cmd+Shift+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with selection) (except Idea)
Ctrl+Home, Ctrl+Shift+Home => Cmd+Up arrow, Cmd+Shift+Up arrow (Move cursor to beginning of file with and without selection) (except Idea)
End => Cmd+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line) (except Idea)
Shift+End => Cmd+Shift+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line with selection) (except Idea)
Ctrl+End, Ctrl+Shift+End => Cmd+down arrow, Cmd+Shift+down arrow (Move cursor to end of file with and without selection) (except Idea)
Ctrl+L => Cmd+L (Open url location) (Only in browsers)
Cmd+Tab => Cmd+Alt+0 (Reassigned command for opening Mission control)
Ctrl+(Shift)+Right/left arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/left arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection) (except Idea)
Ctrl+Up/down arrow => Up/down arrow (Move cursor up/down) (except Idea)
Ctrl+Left Click => Cmd+Left Click (select multiple items) (except Idea)
